name: Blue Box
description: Contains: 2 Coffee sachets, nuts, droewors, chocolate, pretzels and assorted biscuits.

name: Champaign Box
description: Contains: Champaign bottle, 2 glasses, assorted chocolates and pack of handcream.

name: Coffee Box
description: Contains: 2 coffee mugs with 2 coffee sachets each, a box of biscuits and a slab of chocolate.

name: Gin Box
description: Contains: 2 bottles of gin mixers, 2 gin glasses, chocolates and a gin infused hand cream and soap.

name: Green Box
description: Contains: Coffee sachets, chocolate, pretzels, assorted biscuits and crackers, and Pringles.

name: Ice-cream Box
description: Contains: ice-cream sundae glasses, toppings and sauce, chocolates, wafer biscuits and wooden ice cream spoons.

name: Scone Box
description: Contains: A bowl, 2 mugs with coffee sticks, an easy mix scone mix, jam cups and a fridge notepad.

name: Senses Box
description: Contains: 1 item for each of the differnt 5 senses. (Touch, Taste, See, Hear, Smell)

name: Snack Box
description: Contains: Assorted biltong products, Assorted nuts, Dried fruit products and Pretzels.

name: Sunshine Box
description: Contains: Coffee sachets, coffee glasses, chocolate, biscuits and a scarf.

name: Wine Box
description: Contains: A bottle of wine, a wine glass, a serving platter with serving knives, biscuits, chocolate, soaps, handcreams, a fridge notepad.
